org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

Interface Sensor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the resource type to retrieve (i.e. File, URI, Observable
    All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSensor, HTMSensor, ObservableSensor, URISensor

    public interface Sensor<T>
extends Persistable
    Parent type for all Sensors. This type describes strategies used to connect to a data source on behalf of an HTM network (see Network). Subtypes of this type use SensorParams to configure the connection and location details. In this way, Sensors may be used to connect Streams of data in multiple ways; either from a file or URL, or in a functional/reactive way via an rx.Observable or Publisher from this library.
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    SensorParams, SensorFactory, Publisher, Network

      ValueList getMetaInfo()
      Returns the inner Stream's meta information.

      Returns an instance of SensorParams used to initialize the different types of Sensors with their resource location or source object.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static <T> Sensor<T> create(SensorFactory<T> sf,
                            SensorParams t)

        Creates and returns the Sensor subtype indicated by the method reference passed in for the SensorFactory FunctionalInterface argument.

        Typical usage is as follows: 

         Sensor.create(FileSensor::create, SensorParams); //Can be URISensor, or ObservableSensor

        Parameters:
        sf - the SensorFactory or method reference. SensorFactory is a FunctionalInterface
        t - the SensorParams which hold the configuration and data source details.
        Returns:

      • getSensorParams

        SensorParams getSensorParams()
        Returns an instance of SensorParams used to initialize the different types of Sensors with their resource location or source object.
        Returns:
        a SensorParams object.

      • getInputStream

        <K> MetaStream<K> getInputStream()
        Returns the configured Stream if this is of Type Stream, otherwise it throws an UnsupportedOperationException
        Returns:
        the constructed Stream

      • getMetaInfo

        ValueList getMetaInfo()
        Returns the inner Stream's meta information.
        Returns:
